title: [Health] Eat Green!
text: Eat a leafy green snack and submit a picture online!

title: [Health] Exercise Challenge
text: Do a 30-minute exercise routine and share # of calories burned!

title: [Health] Hydration
text: Meet your reccomended glass of water count intake amount today!

title: [Social] Gratitude
text: Send a heartfelt message to a family member about how much you appreciate them!

title: [Social] Touch Grass
text: Go outside to a park and meet a new person!

title: [Social] Quality Time
text: Plan an activity with an old friend.

title: [Professional] Presentation!
text: Prepare & deliver a presentation on a chosen topic!

title: [Professional] Network
text: Attend a talk or gathering related to your line of work!

title: [Professional] Resume
text: Update your resume with your most recently learned skills!
